name: Web Accessibility Compliance by Equally AI
author: EquallyAI

sections.description:
Fast, efficient, and most affordable AI solution to make your website accessible.

Equally AI is an AI-powered solution designed to make websites of all sizes accessible and usable to everyone. It takes minutes to install and does not require any coding experience.

This WordPress plugin can be easily installed on your websites to ensure that they meet ADA, Section 508, and WCAG 2.1 AA and worldwide accessibility regulatory compliance standards.

Equally AI provides the best accessibility solution to help website owners remain compliant and usable to all. Get started with a 14-day trial (no credit card required). To learn more, visit Why Use Equally AI ?.

How Equally AI helps you and your website visitors

Equally AI offers businesses of any size an affordable yet comprehensive accessibility solution.
Once you install the Equally AI plugin and create an account, our AI-powered technology analyzes and automatically fixes accessibility errors. Our engineering team also remediates the errors to make sure your website is compliant.

With Equally AI’s accessibility widget, your website visitors can tailor their experiences to meet their accessibility needs.

Making your website accessible with Equally AI expands your market reach, boosts your brand perception, and reduces the risk of non-compliance lawsuits.

FAQs

Does the Equally AI plugin affect loading speed?

Equally AI does not affect the site’s performance or collect any data. The plugin loads only after the entire site has been loaded and rendered by the browser. Your website will always load at optimal speed to allow your visitors a great browsing experience.

Can I use the WordPress plugin without creating an Equally AI account?

Sadly, no. We employ software as a service (SaaS) to handle all the heavy lifting. We provide a plugin that connects to our service and makes it easy for you to configure it so you don’t have to alter theme files or mess with code.

Is Equally AI plugin WCAG compliant?

Yes. We offer an intuitive, seamless browsing experience that adheres to WCAG 2.1 guidelines. Our technology is continuously updated so we remain compliant with all applicable international accessibility standards, including WCAG 2.1 AA, Section 508, and EU 301559.

Is Equally AI plugin GPDR and CCPA compliant?

Definitely. Equally AI is GDPR & CCPA compliant, as it does not collect any personal information about visitors. Our solutions operate under ISO/IEC 27001 standards and maintain a secure environment.

Do you provide technical support?

Of course! We are always here to assist with any problem at any time!
Once you purchase our widget and install it, we are here to help you solve any issue you might come across, from the installation process to the ongoing customers’ and end users’ handling. We’re also open to receiving your feedback and malfunction reports.
